name: Assignment 42
description:
Stockholm Machina
Set in a 2042 vision of Stockholm, Sweden, Assignment 42 is a robot programming simulator where the player must use AI principles to operate their trusted system machine VERS and locate, liberate and evacuate humans from unfortunate interior disasters.

The day’s come. They finally hired you, friend.
You’re SMRO’s new CONTROLLER.
Strategize, upgrade and work on piecing together different parts and commands to forge the machine you’ll need if you hope to save just about everybody.
